detail.title: Web-based Resourceful Tourism Map Search Engine
detail.description:
● Multiple-page web application based on Model-View-Controller Pattern.
● Restful API based on .NET Core 3.1, Entity Framework 6, Repository pattern and Owin OAuth.
● Fully responsive interface and compatible with all different devices.
● Implement Authentication with Microsoft Active Directory and Routing.
● Backend C# Unit Testing with NUnit and Moq.

detail.title: Online inventory distribution and management system.
detail.description:
● Utilized: React.JS, C# .NET 6.0, Python, MSSQL, Docker, Nginx, Azure Kubernetes Services, Azure DevOps, CI/CD Pipeline.
● Restful API based on .NET Core 6, Entity Framework 6, Repository pattern and Owin OAuth.
● Fully responsive interface and compatible with all different devices.
● Implement Authentication with Microsoft Active Directory and Routing.
● Backend C# Unit Testing with NUnit and Moq.

projects.title: Standards Australia Store
projects.caption: Convenient solutions to buy and access standards

detail.title: Online store to buy and access digital standards.
detail.description:
● Utilized: React.JS, Next.JS, C# .NET 6.0, PostgreSQL, Salesforce, MuleSoft, Segment, HubSpot, Microsoft Azure.
● Restful API based on .NET Core 6, Entity Framework 6, Repository pattern and IAM Auth.
● Fully responsive interface and compatible with all different devices.
● Implement Authentication with Microsoft Active Directory and Routing.
● Backend C# Unit Testing with NUnit and Moq.
